description: This Java source file configures Spring Security for the backend application, setting up password encoding, user details service, authentication manager, and security filter chain with specific access rules.

classes.name: SecurityConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that sets up security details such as password encoding, user details retrieval, authentication, and request authorization.

methods.name: passwordEncoder
methods.description: Defines and returns a PasswordEncoder bean using BCryptPasswordEncoder for encrypting passwords.

methods.name: userDetailsService
methods.description: Defines and returns a UserDetailsService bean that loads user details from UserRepository by email.

methods.name: authenticationManager
methods.description: Defines and returns an AuthenticationManager bean using DaoAuthenticationProvider and ProviderManager.

methods.name: filterChain
methods.description: Defines and returns a SecurityFilterChain bean configuring HTTP security, including CSRF disablement, authorization rules, HTTP Basic auth, and form login.
